text:
We left our ‘city' lives behind and started our 3 week holiday in the lush cocoon that is Ubud, where we relaxed and eased into Bali.  
From there we moved to the coast, and Villa Ambra became our home for 9 magical days.
  Putu and Eka whisked us away to Villa Ambra, where we were met by several gorgeous smiling faces, and with chilled Frangipani scented flannels and refreshing mojitos.
I mention the chilled Frangipani scented flannels because we loved them and savoured them each time we got “home” from a day trip.
The welcome committee also includes a stunning four-legger - a thoroughly modern day lady canine, independent and strong-willed, yet loving.
We spent many hours lounging or playing with her.  
The entire villa is extraordinarily comfortable and welcoming, and styled by a very keen, creative eye - the owners have fabulous taste.
You cannot help but relax and take in the gorgeous views from the open air living room, which faces out to the waves crashing into the beach.
Each ensuite bedroom is beautifully styled, with a unique ‘wow factor' bathroom, equipped with everything you might need.

  The villa’s GM Putu, organised pedicures and massages for us.
The beautiful therapists came to the villa and provided the services on site - the villa has its own massage table – it was the best, what beats a mani, pedi and a massage by the beach?
Eka or Gede, the villa’s very personable drivers, would take us to any place we wanted to go. We thoroughly enjoyed our conversations during the rides.
They drive with such confidence and care that we never felt nervous, and instead enjoyed watching the organised chaos that is Bali traffic.
After spending a few hours out shopping, or on an adventure, we couldn’t wait to get back to the villa’s pool to relax before another divine VA supper.
The 3 incredibly talented chefs, Wayan, Wayan (Lady) and Hendra, whipped up some of the most delicious meals we’ve ever had.
The hot and sour soup, soft shell crab with mango salad and raspberry soufflé were incredible!
In hindsight, we would have loved to go on a trip to the markets with the purchaser Wayan, to see the ingredients and learn more about Balinese food and cooking.
Each evening we were taken care of by one of our lovely night porters, Wira, Suma or Eka.
Better rest and relaxation could not be had any place else - the lullaby of the sea breezes whistling through the trees’ leaves along with the ebb and flow of the crashing waves pacified us into nightly hibernation.
Every morning, after a deep and satisfying sleep, we floated down to breakfast by the pool or at the villa’s exquisite dining table, greeted by the sweet smiles of Dwi, Gede, Ayu, Kadek, or Ayu.
On the morning of our sunrise beach stroll, we were greeted with a warm smile and two lattes…then off we went to frolic in the wet sand and the swash of the waves.
We weren’t dreaming, we were in the dream.

The beach was a firm fixture in our time at VA - a sunrise walk is a must, and the fiery sunsets must not be missed, they are breathtakingly stunning.
Agung, the gardener appeared each morning to tend to the beautiful garden and pool area, where we spent much of our time.
Villa Ambra is kept running efficiently by Wayan and Gede, the engineers, who attended to some blown bulbs as soon as we reported them.
  Lastly, we cannot forget to mention our dear Balinese sister Ketut, who is an incredible and beautiful woman with a big heart.
She is wonderful company and brings joy to her job, which means Villa Ambra is always filled with smiles and laughter.
I mention the smiles several times because Villa Ambra is a happy place, the day is gentle and you are treated with genuine care.

The staff do everything with warmth and love, we were touched by their kindness and attentiveness, and the invisible service which they provide.
  When the day came to say our goodbyes, we considered all 19 staff as our family, and we left a piece of our hearts with them for safe keeping.
We know we will return, and our little Balinese family will be the first place we visit!

PS. Names are not repeated but instead several staff share the same name, and each one is integral to Villa Ambra’s enchanting touch!

With love and gratitude, Myra (London) and Marsha (NYC).
title: Our Bali Home - Villa Ambra stole our hearts

owner_response.text: Wow!  What I am to say to that?  Thank you so much. The staff loved looking after you and hope to see you back before long.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

photos.caption: Breakfast with a view, tough start to the day!

text:
Having stayed on Pantai Lima estate for the past 5 years and the last previous 2 in Villa Ambra, we had some friends coming to stay in asia for a week and wanted somewhere special to stay for a week, or first thoughts were Villa Ambra so i contacted the owners only to be advised that they were in residence for their winter 4 month break, They kindly offered us to come and stay as their guests for the week which we kindly accepted, what can i say other than THANK YOU Geoff and Ellen for your amazing hospitality and kindness to us all. The villa is stunning and the grounds are too, one of my favourite pastimes is watching the surfers as well as eating the delectable food that the chefs cook up for us daily.. sometimes is hard to actually drag yourself away from the villa... The staff are superb and there is nothing that is to much for them.. they are attentive and always friendly.. we love visiting and have yet again booked for this coming April and we are now counting the days before we can return to this beautiful paradise.
My heartfelt thanks go to Geoff and Ellen for opening their home up to us and to all that rent the villa it is truly a magnificent piece of heaven..
title: A BEAUTIFUL VILLA WITH STUNNING VIEW AND AMAZING OWNERS AND STAFF

photos.caption: The resident beauty "Alice" giving me some licks whilst I'm enjoying the sunset
View from the outdoor dining area

text: We did not step out of the villa all five days. We did not see the need to . Has everything you would want including fine cuisine both western and Asian The Indonesian and thai food surpass those from the best restaurants . 19 well trained staff led by a very capable villa manager Putu. Key difference between this and other villas is that the owners live in the villa for a few months in the year and it feels very much like a home. Very Highly recommended .
title: Sublime food and much more : Villa Ambra

owner_response.text: Thanks so much for your wonderful review, and we hope to see you back soon.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: 12 of us spent 5 glorious days at Villa Ambra. Prior to arriving, Geoff the owner and manager Putu had emailed to ensure our smooth arrival. The staff at the villa were so friendly and most helpful. Chefs are so talented - we had breakfast, lunch and dinner EVERYDAY at the villa! No reason to eat out. Homemade cakes and ice cream were delicious! Really appreciated the care taken by the staff to ensure our great stay. Anytime we needed extra towels, water, or even maple syrup, they went out of their way and got it for us. A female staff also helped care for a baby in our group at times. The beachfront location was unbeatable. Will definitely be back. Thank you Putu and team! You guys are amazing!
title: Villa Ambra

owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your splendid review, and we look foreword to see you back.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This is a beautiful private villa on the ocean surrounded by rice terraces. Totally beautiful. 

5 rooms with two front rooms on the ocean with uninterrupted ocean views. Imagine waking up to the sound and sight of the ocean. Extremely well maintained. Great staff.
title: Sound of the sea!! Beautiful

text: A friend hosted a wedding here so we took over 5 out of the 6 villas. Villa Melissa is the most gorgeous villa with a stunning view. My friend had her ceremony there. The rooms were gorgeous and the villa staff were helpful. The only down side is that the rooms lose cool air pretty quickly so the ground floor rooms actually stay cooler than the ones upstairs.
title: Beautiful villas!

text:
Having been a travel agent for 20 years now I have been fortunate enough to experience many levels/types of luxury accommodation throughout the world and I must say that everything about my stay at Villa Ambra was simply wow and one of the best experiences I've had. 

The villa itself with its superb beachfront location had 5 amazing ocean-facing large bedrooms all with gorgeous big bathrooms and superb decor, a study/library complete with hundreds of books and games, a large cinema room, table tennis and massage room.  The villa is build perfectly to make use of all the space and provide you with many options to enjoy every corner... you have the sunken lounge where you can enjoy the sunset with a cocktail in hand, the big adult pool where the whole family can spend hours on end floating around on the inflatable toys or doing laps, the spa and most importantly the kids infinity pool at the top which is perfect if you are travelling with young children as the main outside meal area is right there and you can keep a good eye on them(our 5 year olds spent most of their time in there or in the spa).  A pool fence can be provided if need be.  Enjoy the free homemade sorbet and ice-creams.. the best I have ever tasted!!  

But this in itself is not what made this particular villa experience wow.... as perfect as the villa was it was the food and the staff that took it to yet another level. Putu the villa manager was great, he was there to greet us on the first day and then popped in everyday after that to say hello and check in on things.  There were also another 18 staff members that kept the villa in immaculate condition (must say they had their work cut out for them with our 4 children running riot at times) and looked after all our needs.  They were so discrete and most of the time we never saw them unless they were playing with the kids or preparing for our next meal, bringing a delicious smoothie, coffee... what ever we needed... nothing was too much trouble.  We had a bell if we needed anything but we didn't need to use it as they had the amazing knack of knowing exactly when we were about to ask for something even before we did!!  They were all so friendly and spoke great English. 

Another thing that made this so unforgettable were the chef’s!!!  The food prepared for us (which we picked from their menus) was nothing short of extraordinary!!  Every single meal from salads, Asian nights, seafood nights, bbq nights, desserts etc was outstanding and some of the best I have ever had.  We didn't want to leave the villa for meals as we had the best right there.  

We also had our own driver for up to 8hrs a day which we didn't need as we didn't want to leave the villa but the few times we did use them they were so accommodating.  The complex also had a gym and tennis court which is great and they were happy to organise a yoga class which you could have a private class on the beach front grass area in the villa.  The other great thing which was a big bonus for my husband was the surf break right out the front.  He would wake up before anyone else, be presented with a coffee before he hit the waves and then back for a buffet breakfast and massage!

If you want a luxury getaway whether its for a few friends, families or corporate then I cannot recommend villa Ambra highly enough.  My trips from here on in to Bali will not be complete without at least a few nights back at Villa Ambra.
title: Villa Ambra - Simply WOW

owner_response.text:
We are delighted that you loved Ambra and very appreciative that you took the trouble to write such a comrehensive revere. The staff enjoyed looking after you very much and look forward to your return. 

Very kind regards

Geoff and Ellen Foster-Taylor
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This was the best villa we had  ever come across. We were about 12 people. The five days visit was like  heaven for us. We would like to Thank Mr.Putu and his team.
    We had the best  staff. Never visited  a villa where people  treated you like u more than a family.  They looked after our needs. Mr putu specially  guided  us in or whole  trip. He made plans for us. Geede is fun loving  and caring  personality. We can't  still  forget our favourite  desert the homemade  chocolate  icecream . There  are a lot of memories  in villa ambra which  is worth mesmerising 💞 
      Thank you villa ambra and the whole  staff  for such a wonderful  time we had spent .  We would  surely  love  to visit  it once again .

We had one of the best holidays till date. 💞👍
title: Villa Ambra -HEAVEN  ON EARTH😍

owner_response.text:
Thank you very much for your wonderful review.  Putu and all the staff enjoyed looking after you and hope that you will be back!

With kind regards

Geoff Foster-Taylor
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We spent 5 wonderful days in paradise. Delicious indonesian and western food, nice staff, driver, an amazing vue, a perfect decoration in any detail... Wood and beautiful fabrics, an open house for living where everything is beautiful and easy. We really enjoyed being in such a quiet place, close to animation.
title: Paradise, so simply

text:
Gorgeous villa with a stunning sea view.

You will miss a lot the sunset from the Swimming pool!

The remarkable design touch in every room makes it a fancy place.

Enjoying the breakfast on the terrace of the  room upstairs is such a privilege.

Very quiet place: only the sound of the sea and the birds :)

Great staff, very friendly and careful!

Thanks Villa Ambra!
title: Villa Ambra - Divine Stay

text:
We booked Villa Melissa and Villa Mary for our wedding. The location is perfect which near by Canggu (the most happening place in Bali). We're with 14 people stayed in both villa..

Villa Melissa has amazing view of the ocean, the design and setting of the garden is beautiful. Specially, for grand entrance of the bride to altar.. It was perfect.. The staff are very helpful and nice. Always smile! Our favorite room will be two room in the second floor, it has a great view and full of privacy! 

Villa Mary is the biggest villa in the estate. We love the pool, it's soo big and nice design.. There is a hot tub with view.. Our favorite room will be top floor with rice field view.. The staff are really helpful with our requests.. We're really enjoy to stay there..

The wedding itself turned out to be our fairy tail story.. The setting of the ceremony in villa melissa and romantic dinner in villa mary... 

Thank you soo much with all the staff of Pantai Lima estate.. Absolutely, someday we'll come back! 

Fib&Arj
title: Amazing....... Villa Melissa & Villa Mary!!!!!!!!!!!

text: A true jewel - a tranquil , relaxing and all consuming combination of wonderful sea breeze , incredible sea view , huge swimming pool and absolutely divine staff led by the ever capable and wonderful Made. The dining experience is really as good as any top notch restaurant with a huge menu to choose from. Nothing is too much trouble. We stayed as a small family of three simply because while the accommodation can handle a dozen people we just love the location. It's 20 steps from the pool to absolute beachfront and then a lazy 10 minute walk up to Echo beach to take in the incredible sunset and a Bintang or twelve. Once you have had you fix of Vitamin D (read sunburn) then order the in-house massage for the princely sum of $15 and and try not to catch yourself snoring away as the trickling water of the pond / massage enclosure sends you off into LALA land - sooooo relaxing. This Villa  is not cheap - but like everything in this life you get what you pay for. But, grab a small group of 6 or even 8 people and the cost is an absolute comparable bargain. This is our 4th trip to Pantai Lima and first time in this Villa - they are all spectacular - but we highly recommend both Villa Warringin and Villa Sounds of the sea for their absolute beachfront position and amazing staff plus wonderful cuisine. INSANELY GREAT !
title: Villa Sounds of the Sea is Heaven on Earth - well beach actually

photos.caption: aerial view sounds of the sea villa
sunset view from sounds of the sea balcony
aerial view by drone from sounds of the sea villa
aerial view echo beach boat storage by drone
view from from balcony sounds of the sea villa

text: The best staff that one can get, and beats any 5 star hotel! Food is excellent to the point that we barely went out to eat at restaurants, and we like to eat out. We have been coming to bali for 12 years and this is by far the best place to spend a month.
title: Villa Ambra

owner_response.text: Thanks very much for your review.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: From the beautiful accommodations to the professional staff....our week at Villa Ambra was an absolute treat. Thanks to Putu, the villa manage and his staff.... my family ranging from age 7 to 82 were more than satisfied with our vacation. Hope to be back soon!
title: Perfect family getaway

text: If anyone knows of a better house in a prettier location with a friendlier, happier and more professional staff - anywhere in the world - please let me know!  Villa Ambra and staff is literally off the charts.  Our family experienced a week like no other in our lifetimes.
title: Villa Ambra - off the charts!

text:
Our family of 10 had an amazing experience at Villa Ambra! The location and villa itself was breathtaking, beautiful and completely luxurious - however, it is the staff that made our stay phenomenal. You simply could not fault them, each and every staff member was beyond perfect! They are all such friendly and professional people, and showed a genuine care for making sure each person was comfortable and enjoying themselves. 

In particular, Gedee, he is a true asset to Villa Ambra. He has incredible attention to detail, and organised all of individual requests with perfection. Not an easy feat with so many guests with different itineraries! He is so friendly and polite, and brought a lovely down to earth feel to the Villa. 

The Villa's house keeping staff are also to be commended  -with two infants under 6 months old with us, and each taking daytime sleeps at different times -  staff seemed to somehow know when to not enter the rooms to disturb them, yet each morning they were made up beautifully and each night turned down for comfort. They seemed to know where everyone was, yet were invisible themselves. Even by the pool we were constantly taken by surprise to turn around see that somehow all of the towels had been replaced and fresh water placed down without us seeing anyone at all! This really added to the pampered feeling!

And I simply cannot even find the words to describe how amazing our meals were across the whole week. It was as simple as asking for chefs suggestions, and each meal left everyone astounded at the flavours, techniques and presentation. Each meal left us speechless, we had intended to eat out on occasion but that simply did not happen, we were so keen to just stay at the Villa and try the next meal suggestion! On our last day we had a BBQ, which as Australians is something we pride ourselves in... never again can we boast around the BBQ after experiencing what your chefs put on for us that last day! Simply divine! Breakfast was also beautiful and Villa Ambra's chefs were very accommodating to the different times guests would wake in the morning, some obviously a little worse for wear from the night before   -  "Ambraholics" I believe you would say!

The owners of Villa Ambra have truly created something beyond perfection, and their staff really make that experience one to never forget. We will all be returning to the villa and certainly recommending it to anyone who even mentions 'Bali' to us in the future!
title: Outstanding Villa Ambra!

text:
Having stayed at Pantai Lima Estate for the past 5 years in different villas, this year we were unable to get Villa SoS so were offered Villa Ambra as they had the dates we wanted available, Initially we were a little disappointed as we have now stayed in Villa SoS for 3 years and the staff there have always been faultless.. However on arrival with our group of 11 we were met at the Airport By Putu the Villa Manager along with the 2 cars and a Luggage van (the luggage van was given at no extra cost) we had lovely cold water and a very cold towel which was appreciated.
On arrival at the Villa we were met by Ketut who i have met previously as she had worked in one of the other villas we had stayed in.. She is just one of the nicest people you will ever meet.. Ketut and Putu made our stay memorable and nothing and i mean nothing was ever to much.. The place is paradise personified and the owners have done a fantastic job furnishing the rooms as well as the little touches and the gardens are just stunning! Our sundowners were done each evening on the edge of the villa with views to die for...

The food was phenomenal... I do not think we had a dish in the 7 days that we were there that was not a crowd pleaser... thats an accomplishment when you have 11 people in the group

The staff are unobtrusive but attentive above and beyond I cannot pick just one staff member as they are ALL excellent, the chef, kitchen staff, drivers, waiters, garden staff just everyone made our trip.

We have rebooked again for Villa Ambra for next year and this time are extending our trip for a few extra days!
title: VILLA AMBRA = PARADISE

photos.caption: A view of Ambra from the beach

text:
We went there for a wedding and the setting was incredible. Fantastic Villas, beautiful location and superb staff.
We absolutely loved our stay and would recommend it to anyone who want to live it up in the lap of luxury.
title: Incredible Stay

text: My husband and I had the most amazing stay at Villa Ambra. From the moment that we were picked up from the airport, we were treated like king and queen. Fraganted towel and cold water were offered while on the way to Villa. When we arrived, we were greeted by the most delicious virgin mojito and a wonderful smile. The rest of our stay was as tasty as the mojito:). Staff were friendly and professional. Our room was furnished with the most high standard (especially the pillows, much more comfortable than my husband's chest) and in a calming oriented theme. Open up to the beautiful sea view and the pool is just by our door step. I was surprised that we even received free laundry service, what a big plus:). The owner has 2 cars with drivers that we had the convenience to visit town as we wish. As a foodie myself, a big compliments to Chefs. Every meals were simply sensational. All in all, it was the prefect holidays. Thank you for Villa Ambra giving us the taste of paradise. We very much look forward to our next return. Xxx
title: Paradise Villa Ambra

text:
We rented four of the 5 villas here for our retreat programme for 15 days. Mary, Mellissa, Waringin and Sound of the Sea. The villas are really breath taking, the views are amazing. Some of the rooms are very rustic and have an open concept in their bathrooms and so forth. They overlook the sea, pool and padi fields depending on which ones you stayed in.
A special mention has to be made of the staff especially the ones in Villa Mary which are the Best!!!.Did I say the Best. They really went out of their way to make our stay as comfortable as they could. 
As we were in a big group the food was catered so that wasn't so great. Could have been better. The sea was rather strong while we were there so we spent most of the time in the beautiful pools of the villas. My favourite would probably be Waringin. We really enjoyed our stay there.
title: beautiful villas

text:
Villa Mary is very child-friendly. The chef cooks amazing food and the staffs are very attentive. Villa Melissa is a great venue for party. 

Last year (2013), I made a party for my daughter' second birthday and it was amazing. We had a pool party in villa Mary then we moved to villa melissa for dinner. Wonderful memory!

In July 2014, I stayed again in Villa Mary with my daughter, triplet boys, and 6 nannies. The staff in Villa Mary took care of everything from laundry to preparing food for my children, the nannies, and the other family members. Just mention what you need and the staff will get it for you. The best staffs! Great team work!
title: Villa Mary and Melissa

text: This is simply a world class experience. On the beachfront with a huge wonderful pool we enjoyed Villa Warringin for a whole month. The place is huge with 7 bedrooms so we had people , friends and family coming to stay on and off. The 12 staff were wonderful and looked after us for the entire time. We will go back in a heartbeat. Highly recommend. All villas with the estate of Pantailima Lima are 6 star.
title: Absolute beachfront at villa warringin

text:
I recently had the most wonderful stay at the Villa Ambra  (one of the various villas on property with the beach at its doorstep). Once you stepped in everything was spectacular! the staff were very attentive, friendly, and paid attention to detail.  The layout and décor of the whole place were of great design and high quality. My favourite dish was the pomelo salad and of course had to finish every meal with their delicious home made ice creams...
I would say awesome value for money considering all the services that are provided (free bike rental, laundry, driver (excl. petrol), WiFi, chef, 24 hour butler...)! 
I will definitely be back!
title: Heavenly stay at the Villa Ambra in Pantai Lima!

text:
Villa Ambra has been a jewel find, a little piece of paradise.  The location is exquisite with fantastic views overlooking the beach and spectacular sunsets - make sure to have cocktails on the sunset lounge.  The staff are impecable and the quality of the food is hard to beat.

The Villa has been decorated in keeping with the island feel - but no comfort or luxury spared !  You will get just the right amount of privacy. We would walk to echo-beach along the beach front from the villa.  

The only down side is that you are so well taken care of that one forgets to enjoy the rest the island has to offer... however the Villa has at its disposal up to 2 very comfortable cars [plus driver] that can be arranged with the staff, to make your movements to-and from the villa seamless.

We've been there with friends and family and will be returning at the next opportunity.
title: Villa Ambra - 7-Star villa, food, service & always charming

photos.caption: Villa Ambra Dressed for an Evening Party/Event
Villa Ambra Dressed for an Evening Party/Event
Sunset view from the Sunset Lounge

partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Third time that we have stayed at the Pantai Lima Villas and the second time at Villa Sound of the Sea (we are already planning our next visit for Easter next year). From the staff, the villa, the location and the whole experience it is difficult to find fault. If you are looking for some relaxing time in absolute luxury being treated like a king then this is the right place. Beats any luxury villa hotel experience hands down!
title: Unique Place in the World

text:
I had the pleasure of staying one week at Villa Sounds of the Sea with my husband and 2 families with 5 kids between them.  None of us could fault the villa in any way - in fact it was a really great place to stay.  It was so peaceful with the waves breaking about 50m from the common living area.  In fact, the sound of the waves is constant and really soothing and it's a great surf break for those so inclined.

There were five double rooms, 2 of which had uninterrupted views of the beach and surf break.  Each room had its own bathroom.  All the fittings and beds were really comfy - there was a bath in each bathroom (one was even on the balcony!).

The meals and relaxing area were great as was the very cool infinity pool.  All the staff were extremely helpful and wonderful with all the children.  The food was ok but on the one night some of us attended a wedding, apparently the food was exceptional (change of chef.....). Afternoon teas were always yummy though.  All the food was very reasonably priced.

In peak hour, Canggu is a long way from any action in Seminyak and can take up to an hour but the tranquility at all other times makes the distance worth it.

I highly recommend this or any of the villas in the Pantai Lima estate.
title: Very peaceful, luxurious, serene and relaxing

text: We have just returned from our wedding in Bali which was held @ Villa Melissa - Pantai Lima Estate.  What an experience!!!  The villa and estate is amazing 6 stars.  We loved the whole experience of being able to have all our children and partners staying in the one place where the wedding was, we had 4 days there.  It was heaven, our wedding couldn't have been better (anywhere in the world)!!  Our hats are off to the staff, event planners and everyone connected with the villas!!  If anyone is thinking of a wedding in Bali, Villa Melissa Canggu is all I can say, our photos and video are amazing, the scenery of the villa and beach outstanding, we couldn't be happier.  Our staff there felt like part of our family!!  We'll be back!!  Julie and David - Adelaide, Australia
title: Wedding @ Villa Melissa

text: We have just had my daughters wedding here and what an experience . We booked Mary and Mellissa as we had 85 guests{ not all staying} The whole three days were fantastic and the staff were always helpful and nothing too much trouble. The weather was fine so the wedding on the lawn at Melissa was stunning and reception at Mary was  like a dream come true. Getting married...... Pantai Lima . simple !!
title: Pantai Lima...... awesome !!!!

text: We booked Villa Melissa & Villa Warringan for our weddin in July 2011. We stayed with our friends in Villa Melissa and couldn't have been happier. The decor, the professionalism of the staff, management was unreal. If luxury if what you require than come here.The online photos of this place are amazing, but once you get there, you'll jaw will hit the floor. The grandeur, seclusion, incredible food, picturesque setting between ocean and sea is unreal! We cannot wait to go back. We booked a private yoga instructor daily whilst there and enjoyed every moment. You won't even want to leave!  You will have wished that you had booked longer once you were there. Villa Melissa was where the wedding was held and quite the venue for events and entertaining, the pool was the perfect temperature to swim! The guests that stayed at Villa Warringan loved it and enjoyed the family feel it had. I feel bad even telling others about this, as I want to keep this little gem all to myself! Book it! You won't regret it!
title: Absolutely Stunning! A must go! Can't wait to come back.....

text: One of the most enjoyable, relaxing and memorable trips! The Villa Sound of the Sea is located at a very nice, serene and relaxing place just by the sea in Bali. It is very clean, cozy and spacious with lot of greenery and has 5-star amenities and food. One can just walk down to the beach, hear the waves and sit on the sunny and white sandy beach and have a splendid time. Also enjoy the outdoors, jog, swim, surf, make a trip to the local villages or ride a bike through the town. Definitely recommend with friends and family for a perfect holiday by the Sea!
title: Amazing Stay and would love to be back!

text: We have been twice to Villa Sound of the sea, in 2008 and 2010. We just loved it. It is the perfect balance between family holiday, relax, time for yourself (you easily find professional staff to take care of kids during your leisure time), great eating, surfing. We work hard all year long and it is just the perfect formula to take time for yourself, spend great time with your family and your friends, and enjoy an ultimate luxury and refinement experience. Discrete and efficient staff, astonishing ocean view, fantastic pool... Nothing is missing. We will go back as soon as we can ! We've been to many great spots and this is the best by far.
title: Ultimate luxury in family : what else  ?

text: A beautiful property situated on the north of Seminyak, not to close, not to far. The best place I found in Bali to have holidays with family or with friends (and I have tried a lot). The property has 3 distinctive houses, two with bedrooms and the impressive living area. It is just perfect for holidays together without being together all the time. Gorgeous garden and an absolute beachfront to enjoy the waves of Bali. The staff is efficient and discreet, very friendly with kids, meal are delicious and they are doing exactly what you want without charging more than your market list. Decor is sumptuous. If you're looking for the best, this place is for you!
title: Just Heaven

text: We went to Villa Sound of the Sea with two other couples. Despite the house being suitable for 5 couples, we realized that it would still be a cheaper and much fancier option than taking three small rooms in a hotel. We were all in dire need of relaxation and ready to be pampered. The setting of the house is amazing. You are so close to the beach, you could imagine being on a very luxurious boat. At the back of the house there were beautiful rice fields among which we were doing our daily jogging. The big garden by the beach was the place to follow our yoga class every evening, before going to the lounge bale for a daily massage. The food was also delicious. We asked the cook for healthy light food, and he very nicely obliged. Despite indulging in desert every night, no one seems to have gained weight☺ At night, the men were happy catching up on violent movies in the media room, while we were happily chatting in the huge living room watching the wave, and listening to the …Sound of the Sea.
title: An amazing villa in an incredible location

text:
We spent 2 weeks at Villa Mary on the Pantai Lima Estate in Bali. We had the best holidays ever. The villa was absolutely beautiful and very tastefully decorated. The view on both the Indian Ocean and the rice terrasses was stunning, not to mention the romantic sunset. This is the perfect place for couples with friends and children who want the luxury of a 5* hotel and the privacy of your own villa. Everything is catered for, the buttlers are here to look after you and the dedicated chef customised our menu for two weeks with amaizing food with a French twist. We felt it was a great value for money at this high end level as all drinks and food were charged at cost which makes a massive difference when you compare with a top hotel. 
For Gold amateurs, the Meridien Golf course (one of the best in Asia) is only 15mn away and great shopping and nighlife is available in Seminyak should you decide to leave to leave Paradise driven by the villa chauffeur.... 
We will definitely come back next year.
title: Best holidays ever at Villa Mary

text: We stayed 3 weeks in Villa Sound of the sea in August 2008, with our 3 children and 3 other families. Our objective was a perfect relaxing holiday after one year of hard working, with our young children but as well with time for doing things for ourselves. The least we can say is that this holiday was just perfect in all aspects. We are used to luxury 5 star resorts, both for business and private purpose, but there we found something far better and a lot more personal. Luxury is everywhere in this villa, but just the right way. Whatever you want to have, you just ask and you have it: luxury bedrooms, wonderful swimming pool over the sea, jacuzzi between the sea and the pool, wonderful open air living room where we loved to plug our Ipod while having a great coktail, prepared by a perfect team (Balinese kindness and top professionalism, just the perfect service) while our young children were taken care of by great Nanny found by the management, and the older ones were playing together in a perfectly secured place. 4 months after this stay, we are just looking forward to going back there, since it is by far the best holiday we ever had. Be it for a romantic trip, a family one, or with friends, you will not regret your Pantai Villa Sound the Sea stay !
title: Real Luxury in Pantai Lima Sound of the Sea

text:
I wanted to take my girlfriend somewhere really special to celebrate our first year together. 

There was an article in a magazine I saw which mentioned this new beach-front villa complex in Bali and spoke very highly of it.

We stayed at the Sound of the Sea villa, and it could not have a more descriptive name, the crashing of surf has always been something I've really liked.

There are five villas in the complex, four occupied, but you wouldn't know it. We were totally unaware of any other guests.

Our room faced the beach on an upper level, and it was just perfect to lie in bed and see the waves coming in. 

The place says it is "super luxury" and I would go along with that, but it isn't the stuffy type of luxury which stops one enjoying oneself, laid-back luxury I guess you'd call it.

The food was excellent too. My girlfriend is Asian, and we were pleased that they offered real Asian food as well as western.

The staff really went out of the way to make us feel special and this leads to  my only criticism: the place is relatively newly-opened and the staff are so anxious to please that they try perhaps a little too hard. (Take a tiny sip of water at dinner,and someone is right there to top up one's glass.) 

But I know that after a few weeks, they'll take it more in their stride and relax a little. 

So to sum up, an absolutely brilliant time, and I can thoroughly recommend the place to anyone.
title: I cannot speak too highly about our experience here

photos.caption: The infinity pool is right at the beach-front. There's a jacuzzi between the pool and the sand.
There's something incredibly romantic about the sound of surf
Everything is focussed towards the stunning sea vies

text: I have just been to Pantai Lima (villa Sound of the Sea) with my family of five and my brother and his family of four. It was our best holidays ever. I had never been to a villa before, as I always thought a five star hotel was much more relaxing. How wrong I was. The amount of personal attention you get in a villa is unmatchable by a hotel. Everyday we were spoiled by the delicious food, the kindness of the staff, the personal trainer, everyone was working hard to make our stay unforgettable. Our children played in the garden and the children pool creating adventures that could last days, while we the adults could appreciate the sophisticated ambiance of the villa. The house is a mix of traditional architecture and modern furnishing. Its location right on the beach, gave us the feeling to step into a postcard everyday. I would highly recommend it to couples celebrating an anniversary or adults with children who still want very luxurious holidays. I also appreciated the fact that there are 4 common rooms on top of the five bedrooms making sure we got never bored.
title: Incredible experience

text: Paradise! we stayed at the villa melissa at pantai lima and it was out of this world. The villa is right on the beach and the sunset views are just amazing. Everything is brand new and the best of the best, from the food and the service to all the facilities. The other great thing about it is the proximity to seminyak, which is the epitomy of Bali cool. Great restaurants and bars, very trendy and high class, much more so than Kuta. This trip really opened my eyes to what luxury living is all about. If you're not on the beach, then you're nowehere. I'm definitely doing another trip to Pantai Lima, and I'll try one of the other 4 houses next time.
title: WOW!!!!

text:
We were in Bali at the end of August for a wedding at the Pantai Lima Villas. The wedding was magical and the villas are simply beautiful. It looks like some place out of a movie or travel magazine. Gorgeous grounds, infinity pools and easy access to the beach.
We stayed at the Sound of the Sea Villa (SOS) and were very well looked after by the staff who went beyond the call of duty to make sure we had a good stay. Meals were cooked on the villa and based on what we want to order for the day. The food cost was very reasonable.We also had a driver drive us to all the sights,to restaurants and shops.
Absolutely recommend the Villas if you want a quiet and relaxing holiday away from the crowds.
title: Awesome Villas and Staff

text: Full service, meals,immaculate, staff were so friendly and offered the world.  We had masseuse come in for $15 hr, hairdressers to do Bali beading.  You asked for it they got it.  Thank you everyone we will see you in a year for another holiday.
title: Treated like Royalty

text:
We came for a friends wedding all 5 villas hired n we stayed at villa waringin. Was amazing.  Pool beautiful the staff esp harry were accomodating beyond all expectations.  

We had ac issues first 2 nights when mentioned it was fixed immediately.  

Found out the other villas had free laundry service so ask if u need. U can keep food not eaten for next meal as there ia always left over. U have a menu to choose a few dishes from for lunch n dinner n the amercian breaky is the best all rounder. Just ask for toast bit more cooked. Seafood bbq is the best all food cooked fresh. We spent about $250aud on breakfast lunch n dinner over 4.5 days-we just split up for # of rooms the bill. They will give u a big bill on 2nd days thats for their main shop.

 Outside showers are a treat in such warm weather. The stereo in our villa wasnt really working but the got someone to fix it. Theater room at villa melissa could easy fit 30 ppl its perfect if u have teenagers. 

The wedding was held at villa melissa n was beautifully presented and the reception was at villa.mary n was like a fairytale was absolutely stunning. Lots of fun esp when everyone jumps in the pool end of the night

If u can stay here its worth the money. Do stop by the bottle shop on ur way here on first day and get some cash bc the atm ia bout 10min drive. 

Enjoy n relax!!
title: Wow amazing

text:
Villa Waringin is probably the best place we've been to in Bali and we've traveled extensively since 15 years, we also own a property there. The fact that beach meets the rice terraces and the calm and quietness of this area make it so enjoyable and great for a family trip. 
Service was outstanding in every way, and the villa design is very exotic and well thought. 
Nothing we challenged that didn't meet or exceed our expectations, therefore i totally recommend families reunions and B'day parties in this Villa. You'll have a blast and more.
title: Awesome all the way

text:
Villa Ambra is a beautiful beachfront villa.  The first and lasting impression was that this was a home.  The decor was stunning and the open air living space was a perfect gathering for canapés and later for a movie in the ocean breeze.
The bedrooms are all suites with individual bathrooms and lots of privacy.  The food at Villa Ambra was 5 star.  Everything was incredibly fresh and perfectly seasoned.  The homemade icecream and sorbets were the best I have ever had.  Villa Ambra is managed by the gracious, Putu and the staff was attentive and accommodating.  
When booking, be very specific and request Villa Ambra. This home is privately managed and the owner takes pride in the exceptional service provided.  I look forward to one day returning to this incredible home on the beautiful beach of Canngu.
title: Amazing villa with unrivaled service

text:
VILLA MARY

The problem with Villa Mary is that it is rather isolated on Pantai Lima Estate,  half an hour or more – depending on the traffic – from the nearest of the populated centres, Seminyak. 

And around an hour from both the airport and Ubud.

Because of this you are more or less a captive guest.

So when we were told on arrival that the complimentary car and driver for 10 hours a day (exclusive of petrol costs) would not be provided now because of a “change of management” we were stunned.

Whoa there, we said! That’s not on!  

The transport was part of the contract when our son and his fiance booked the place for ourselves and other guests many months earlier, and also was featured in the Villa Mary offering on the internet.

A hurried staff phone call to the off site “GM” was followed by a grudging agreement to provide the service! 

But the driver soon began telling us that he was only available for eight hours – not 10 - and that he wanted IR50,000 an hour after he finished what he claimed was his shorter shift

He also suggested several times that we should give him cash for petrol, when we were already being billed for that at up to 50% more than the actual expenditure (which we pointed out to the staff and had deducted).

So we were getting the uncomfortable feeling we were being  “handled.” 

Then we discovered that the bridal couple had been slugged $A1500 extra to have their wedding guests to their “after party” despite the fact that they had already forked out some $10,000 to rent the five suites of rooms for the week. (Their guests contributed proportionately to help defray the accommodation costs). 

Their poolside function was catered for and staged by an outside company - which organized the decorations, bar staff, DJ, waitstaff and food service - and required no contribution of either labour or support from Villa Mary. As we were already paying for the villa staff as part of the overall rental, what was the basis for an extra fee? 

The charge, we were informed, had something to do with “the noise."   

Which seems bizarre given that during our stay we were subjected to several days of loud and monotonous pre-recorded chanting played over an amplifying system, from dawn until well beyond dusk, from a nearby temple.   

Whatever the explanation, the surcharge and the attempt to renege on the car and driver part of the deal, seemed to smack of avaricious opportunism.

Which is  why I would never again consider becoming a captive guest at Villa Mary or anywhere else at Pantai Lima Estate. 

Villa Mary’s website claims that the nearby black sand beach is cleaned ”twice a day” and “is rarely used by tourists or locals” but we encountered plenty of people there, especially at sunset, as well as somewhat unfriendly dogs, piles of rubbish, and even a snake as we strolled back from nearby Seseh Village.

The beach also became an off road motorcycle track, complete with high-revving, ear splitting noise, for some considerable time late one afternoon.

Another evening we were assailed by kerosene fumes and smoke from the adjoining villa and forced to move from around the pool, with neither notice nor apology.  An assault on mosquitoes, we were told.  It certainly was, driving them into our villa in their droves! At least the gekkos had a good feed.

One of our two air conditioning units went from whisper quiet at the start of the night, to the sound of a light aircraft after midnight and then to the roar of a jumbo jet in the early dawn. When I turned off the unit, I was showered by chips of ice!!

The website’s claim that sliding doors in our suite  (501) “make it easy to step right into the pool” ignores the fact that its some 30 metres away across the lawn towards the beach. 

While the place is architecturally quite impressive, with a swimming pool, well kept lawns and airy entertainment areas, it is in the middle of rice paddies and watermelon fields.
  
The villa, which was  built in 2007, is physically quite pleasant but starting to show its age. The varnish on the floors is peeling. The surfaces in the bathroom are deteriorating. The cinema smells musty.

On the credit side, the staff were efficient and ever ready to help. Ely and Bagus, as the  “overseers,’  kept a weather eye on our needs from day one and coordinated both our food and  transport requirements, including taxis when needed.

There was neither sight nor sound from management during our stay .... everything was left to local staff.

But the bottom line is that Villa Mary was not all that it was cracked up to be, for all of the reasons outlined above.

Perhaps its time for an overhaul of its ethos, together with a management review?
title: VILLA MARY, PANTAI LIMA ESTATE, SESEH, BALI

owner_response.text:
We are very upset that you were given misinformation regarding the transport, and that some maintenance appears to be overdue. These matters are being taken up with the managing agents.

It is most unfair to extend your view to include the other villas, which you have not visited and are under separate ownership and management.

Fred, owner of Villa Mary
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: As a first time Bali visitor, I had no pre-conceived ideas of the country, the culture or the people. Villa Waringin was a perfect introduction to all three. The villa itself was beautiful with hints of the French colonial to it, set in its own private grounds. The pool with views to the Indian Ocean was a daily delight, and the outdoor day beds made relaxation even easier. But what is location without service? Ngurah and the staff at Villa Waringin were perfect, complying with the multiple requests of the three families staying under their roof, and anxious to provide a flawless Balinese experience. This experience extended beyond the compound gates, as we were very well looked after by Putu Candra, a driver of infinite patience and humility, who took us wherever we needed to go and provided good company too. We'd love to come back one Day!
title: Memorable Villa Waringin

photos.caption: Fresh flowers in the reception room

text:
My friends and I came to Villa Waringin in March 2014. For me, it was my second time at Villa Waringin. This stay was as incredible as my first stay with my family (in August 2013). The villa is family-friendly, cosy, luxurious, peaceful, well located in front of the sea with a breathtaking view and 15 minutes away from Seminyak. The staff is very helpful. The butlers give great suggestions regarding surrounding temples, local markets, seafood restaurants on the beach, surf spots etc. They will make your stay unforgettable. The driver is very kind and knows Bali extremely well. The food is definitely worthy of a 5-star hotel. I particularly enjoyed the private new spa of Villa Waringin.

I highly recommend Villa Waringin to those who want to experience the ultimate holiday in Bali.
title: A second amazing stay at Villa Waringin

text: The amazing villa had many luxurious rooms for our large group. The staff were amazing they were great with children, very helpful drove us were everywhere. The chef made what ever you if you informed him earlier. There was a large cinema in the villa that could fit up to eighty people in if needed there was a large selection of movies if you wanted to sit around and watch movies all day . No matter what sort of holiday you are looking for Pantai Lima can give you that perfect holiday.
title: Villa Mary

owner_response.text:
Dear fickle2014

Warmest greeting from the Pantai Lima Estate,

First of all we would like to thank you for your positive review and praise comment toward to Villa Mary as one of our finest property at Pantai Lima Estate ,The Pantai Lima Estate  team and the Balion Management  are highly appreciate and motivated to knows that you and party still have a clear view and a memorable experience  with the Villa Mary, on behalf of the team of the Villa Mary we thank you for your great review and we look forward to have an opportunity to welcoming you again for your next holiday trip at The Pantai Lima Estate.

Once again thank you very much

Artha
Operation manager
BaliOn Management
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This was our second time back to Sound of the Sea.  It is exquisite.  Where to start?  The villa lives up to the overwhelming impression that is provided on the website.  Pure luxury and fine taste!

The staff were very attentive.  We have four kids and they happily engaged the children playing games and providing supervision when required.  The kids quickly bonded with the staff and really enjoyed playing with them. 

They chef was excellent.  Don’t be afraid to choose the more sophisticated items from the menu.

We got great support with arranging different activities, horse riding (horses came to the beach in front of the villa!!!!), golf etc and with the car and driver able to fantastically deal with our ad-hoc requests.  Canggu Beach is approximately 20 minutes away from Seminyak which is just perfect for us.  Head in, enjoy the bustle, bit of shopping and perusing and then head back to the tranquility and luxury of the villa.

Sound of the Sea – a wonderful indulgence we look forward to repeating.

Oh – the kids asked me to mention the huge movie room.  They loved it.
title: Sound of the Sea – a wonderful indulgence we look forward to repeating.

text:
My husband and my 6 months old daughter have been to Bali for the first time and have chosen to stay at Villa Mary with some friends.
This villa was perfect, peaceful, luxurious, great view in front of the beach and the rice fields. 
It is very well located and the driver is always available if we want to go somewhere. The staff is amazing especially the butler and the cook staff. 
We had the feeling to be at home: much better than a hotel but with all the services that you find in a 5 stars hotel.
The rooms are very comfortable and each one is different (some of them have an outdoor shower).
There is also a gym room, a tennis and the best infinity pool (even a kids pool).
We will definitely come back next year!
title: Perfect villa in Bali

text: I have stayed twice at Villa Sound of the Sea with the whole family and 4 children. This is the best experience we ever had even compared to the high standard of service in Asian Resorts. The personnel is extremely attentive and makes you feel so special by answering and anticipating every request so graciously. As you arrive, you cross the most beautiful rice fields and this itself is an enchantment! As you arrive at the villa, you are greeted by an amazing and solid team. Breakfast in the villa is exquisite with all sorts of fruits, crepes, speciality bread and delicious banana pancakes. The pool is beautiful and extremely relaxing. Juices and fresh water are served to you throughout the day by the poolside and you might want just to cross the lawn to walk on the beach. The staff arranged massages for us every night at the villa and the ladies were excellent! In the evening we had the most beautiful barbecue  just next to the sea as there is a beautiful dining table for 10 just next to the beach.  The whole villa was lit with candles and soft lighting. The children had a wonderful time picking up shells on the beach, playing by the pool, having a scrumptious tea time and enjoying movies in the entertainment room. There is a few tennis courts as well. The villa driver takes you everywhere you wish with a smile and the city center is just about 20mns away. The rooms are very well appointed and extremely clean and everybody finds its own space among the big estate. This is our second stay and we have found Heaven!! Villa Sound of the Sea we will back!!!
title: The Most Amazing Stay! This must be Heaven!!

photos.caption: Most Relaxing poolside and access to the beach

text: Sound of the Sea is something else entirely, it's not a villa - it's an experience. I went on a family/friend holiday to Bali and stayed here and at another private villa with cooking and cleaning staff, and it simply does not compare. Sound of the Sea is so far beyond its competition that it really shouldn't be in the same league. The staff are helpful and lovely, no ask cannot be met and it's almost as if they know what you want before you want it. Ray, the driver ready to go all times of the day, is one of the nicest people we had all met and made the scenic drives all the more pleasant. The scenery speaks for itself - so beautiful it could be a painting. I cannot recommend Sound of the Sea enough, the most incredible holiday experience I've ever had - beyond the luxury of the Maldives. Thankyou!!
title: Never experienced anything like it

text:
There are lots of luxurious villas in Bali, what we liked about Waringin is how refined and peaceful it was. Owners have obviously paid a lot of attention to details, putting their own touch that gives the villa this warm feeling. We spent a wonderful few days there. Our stay at Waringin was very special and we would strongly recommend it if you are looking for an oasis of calm, refined, close to the Balinese culture while being not far from the exciting life and sit seeing Bali has to offer.

As we enter the villa, you are already in paradise, walking through a luxurious and colourful garden, before entering the beautiful open Balinese style house, facing the ocean. Everything in the villa is made to set your mind free, to make you feel at ease and comfortable. All you hear is birds and waves in the background.

The location is perfect, quiet, private and directly on the beach. One morning, we were lucky to see Balinese religious ceremonies on the beach just in front of the house, you can go surfing and see local fishermen going about their life.

The large living room is very tastefully decorated with large sofas and Balinese furniture and is open to the outside, facing the immense infinity pool and the beach (we had wonderful breakfasts there). The bedrooms have all a special touch, with the two master bedrooms facing the ocean, and others overlooking the Balinese countryside and rice fields. On one late evening, after enjoying a nice evening with friends, the staff installed the home cinema, of excellent quality.

The staff was very nice, omnipresent while being very discreet, making sure that the house was always tidy, the bedrooms well-prepared and our wishes all taken care of. They would offer drinks at the pool, organize our visits if need be. A special attention was given to cooking, the chef was always attentive to our wishes and looking to make us happy. Meals were absolutely delicious!
title: Exquisite Waringin!

text:
We stayed at the Pantai Lima villas in September 2013 where there are five villas for rental in the same location.  Our wedding party took up four of the villas - Villa Melissa, Villa Waringin, Villa Sound of the Sea and Villa Mary - my family stayed in Villa Mary.

What an amazing experience!  Thanks to Wayan and the crew at Villa Mary, who took such special care of us and treated us like family.  The scenery was beautiful and each of the rooms in the villa were glorious!  They all had something different to offer and each were special in their own way.  Our room (the lower Garden Room even had an outside shower overlooking the rice fields - wow!).

The wedding itself was held in Villa Melissa - stunning location with the sea as the backdrop to such a celebrated occasion.

The day-after party was held at Villa Sound of the Sea - just superb!

Thanks again to Wayan and everyone at Villa Mary for making our stay so special.
title: Villa Mary the Pick of the Bunch!

text: Beautiful villa, amazing view with direct access to the beach. The staff was so lovely and welcoming. I asked for a BBQ the first night and the set up was very nicely done with candles everywhere around the pool/garden/dining table. Perfect for 5 couples, everyone had its own space. 20 min drive from the trendy restaurants. The last day we had to leave the property very early due to our flight schedule, but still had a full breakfast organised for us in the morning and nothing was never an issue. Definitely planning to come back!
title: Perfect!

text: This is more than a villa its a private resort.  Having stayed in a regular Bali villa with a couple of staff and a cook on call Sound of the Sea is so superior to this experience it can't be considered in the same category.  With a fully staffed kitchen and a trained chef, no request cannot be met.  We had some American friends staying with us and they actually requested rice krispie treats, something the chef had never heard of but he happily found the recipe and made them for us.  All the little things were thought of, towels were constantly replaced by the pool, the staff were always present but never obvious and on hand for anything we might want, including many G&T's throughout the day!  Visually this villa is breathtaking as is the location, you literally will not want to leave but if you do the driver is on hand to take you wherever you want to go.  On top of this we had massages every day which were enjoyed by all.
title: More than a Villa

text:
Our friends had their wedding at Pantai Lima in September 2013, and booked Villa Melissa, Villa Waringin, Villa Sound of the Sea and Villa Mary for 3 nights.
I stayed at Villa Waringin in one of the rooms in the larger front house that faces the pool and beach, and although I normally stay at lower budget places when travelling, staying here was such an amazingly splendorous experience with my friends! Our room had a four poster bed with sheet mosquito netting, a walk-in wardrobe, a big copper bathtub and outdoor balcony shower. The staff service was very comprehensive, and I felt a little over-indulged at times! The food prepared by the staff (after consultation with us about what we wanted) was delicious. When you're in the pool it feels like it extends out onto the ocean, simply breathtaking.
I would recommend staying at any of these villas for a special family or group holiday or event like a birthday or wedding for sure.
title: Wow this place blew me away!

text: My family and I spent a wonderful week in Villa Waringin in August 2013. Our stay exceeded our expectations. Villa Waringin is amazingly located. The spot is simply incredible between the rice fields and in front of the sea. The villa is welcoming, well decorated, very charming and perfectly maintained. The indoor and outdoor furniture are both sophisticated and in touch with Balinese tradition. The quality of the food, the experience and kindness of the staff clearly shows the standard of a 5-star hotel. The butler is available 24/7 to recommend outdoor activities and sightseeings (Tanah Lot temple, water rafting, field trips in Ubud, surfing).The spa and the home cinema are two musts of Villa Waringin if you are looking for an entertaining and relaxing stay. I highly recommend Villa Waringin for anyone who wishes to spend an incredible vacation.
title: Stunning Villa Waringin

text:
We just spent 6 days at this Villa.  This would have to have been the best Villa experience we have ever had in Bali.
Property is amazing and staff are more than amazing.  They could not have done anything more for us if they tried.  I can highly recommend this property and you certainly will not be disappointed.  If you are tired of staying in the hectic parts of Bali this is definitely a winner.  Cant wait to plan our next trip back
title: Stunning property amazing staff

text:
Its taken me a while to do this but Ive wanted to write a review of our wedding to provide some helpful insights and recommendations for future destination weddings.  Firstly if you are choosing bali because its cheap think again.  They have all cottoned on to us expat travellers and the prices i found were the same as Australia in the end but the venue and experience incredible, well worth it.  We chose Pantai Lima estate after going to Villa Melissa for a friends wedding a year prior.  What we didnt know was it was an estate of 5 houses so perfect for us to rent the lot to house all of our friends and family.  We rented 4 of the 5 properties as one was not available and hosted our wedding at Villa Melissa with the ceremony on the lawns of Villa Mary as we had 62 guests and 10 children.  What was a little disappointing was the new management of Pantai Lima (Bali On) - they require all villas rented out for a min of 5 days which we did (at a high cost) and then charge for hosting the wedding based on the size which had not linked to cost per head but just a random cost over 50 was deemed a large wedding and therefore was a cost of $4000 management hire, where as under 50 was $2000 - as I just scrapped over I was hit with $4000 which was disappointing and poorly managed by them.

That aside the venue is STUNNING i love villa Melissa so much and choosing Villa Mary for the ceremony venue worked out perfectly.

Some recommendations:

1. Island Events - I used Susan and her team to coordinate absolutely everything for us and they were incredible - even down to prior accommodation, cars for the week, recovering lunch, site seeing for guests - the list is endless.  I cannot recommend them enough.

2. Bali Catering - the food was INCREDIBLE!  and so reasonable, the cost also includes all the tables and chairs, we even tasted the meal and wines a week before all were awesome.

3. Blooms - flowers were AMAZING, the decorated both villas for us and it looked stunning.  I did a simple powerpoint slide of what I liked and on the day was blown away it was better than I could have imagined (see photos).

4. Cake - I used Ixora cakes and opted for one with lots of cupcakes which went down well for desert the next day.

Other tips:

- I got all the guests to bring a bottle of verve, this even lasted the next day and was a great idea.
- I would highly recommend a good photographer - ours wasnt great and think its worth the investment
- we checked in on Friday and hosted a weclcome cocktail party at the W hotel - this was awesome.  The wedding was the next day which was good to get it all done and recovery BBQ on the Sunday.
- September - the weather was perfect, not the usual hot sticky bali weather so would recommend this time of the year

Im sure I will think of more to ad.  But please ask away if you have any questions.  All in all, I would highly recommend Bali and Pantai Lima, the venue is so breathtaking every guest now wants to go back.  And having Island events to manage it all for us was so worth it.
title: A perfect wedding venue

text:
There are not many bad things, I can say about this place, though it is on the high end side, but it's worth it. The lush grounds and the beautiful seaside settings makes this an ideal place to get away and forget the world. With wonderful staff attending to your every need and all your meals covered and grounds filled with every facility, there really is no need to leave this place. 

And you won't want to. The ocean side infinity pool and the multiple cabanas and beach side BBQs are enough to keep you locked in this tucked away complex. Oh and there is a gym and tennis courts. 

No matter what, you are guaranteed to have quiet relaxing undisturbed rest in a place like this.  Your own joy is fully in your control.
title: Stunningly Wonderful

text:
This is simply stunning. The staff, facilities and everything, is first class.

Went for a wedding and was lucky enough to stay in Villa Warringi (spelling). The place is stunning, with fantastic staff who will do everything to help. 

If you're lucky to go here, then go, it's worth it. Check out the photo, '6.45am poolside' I think that says it all!
title: Simply Perfect

text:
We just got married (April 27th 2013) in Villa Melissa, and stayed in Villa Waringun, Villa Melissa and Villa Mary with around 30 friends over the wedding period. The location is simply stunning, and the villas are beautifully designed to compliment the location.  This was a perfect venue for a gathering of friends and family, and great for kids.  The staff were fantastic - every whim is catered for, the food was excellent (huge BBQs and Babi gulung) and nothing was too much trouble.  Many thanks to Astawa, who we dealt with during the wedding organising, and who oversaw the villa estate, and also to the villa teams who looked after our friends.  Special thanks also to Ellie in Villa Mary (where we stayed), who was there to answer any questions that cropped up.  

We have stayed in all manner of accommodation in Bali over the last decade or so, but these villas are in a class of their own - we simply did not want to leave!  We cannot recommend this place highly enough, and will be back as soon as possible!
title: Absolutely perfect

text:
We stayed in “Villa Mary” for 5 days in a group of friends and family with 7 adults and 3 children (aged 2 to 5 years old) and had an amazing break from Singapore… a gem of a Peaceful Haven!

Only about 30 minute drive from Seminyak, but can still feel the real Bali atmosphere…

We were welcomed by the driver at the airport and after a bit less than an hour’s drive, we arrived at the Villa, where the staff greeted us with some delicious non-alcoholic mojito like refreshments. 

After a very good night sleep, we went to have our breakfast and were just amazed by the beauty of the surroundings and nature. On one side you can see the Ocean, on the other side you see the lush green rice fields… And in between beautiful landscaped gardens, Frangipani scents, a stunning lap pool, lounging chairs, beautiful architecture made of a perfect blend of Balinese and contemporary style. The décor has been carefully thought through selecting and using for the most local craftsmanship and products without compromising on luxury and comfort.

One evening we had a Seafood  BBQ! The Chef had carefully selected some fresh fish, crab and prawns at a nearby local market.  All was cooked to perfection and accompanied by one of their specialty “Sambal Matah”, a typical Balinese raw/spicy salad mixture. A real feast festival! Make sure to ask for one of those! Not to be missed.

If you fancy like me watching surfers catching waves, you are spot on. Just walk a few metres down left on the beach and it is a real pro surfers spot! If you don’t meet surfers, you might bump into horse riders!

On another day we decided to go on a mountain bike ride with Regis from Archipelago-adventure, this is not for the fainthearted but just another highlight of our trip. I highly recommend it if you fancy a bit of exercise. This will plunge you amidst the lush green rice fields, mountains and authentic Balinese villages.

Also this would not have been possible without the super nanny Yaya who looked after our two year old boy. She is just amazing and totally reliable! And I am not saying this easily because it is amongst the most difficult thing to do to leave your most precious one with someone you hardly know…

We went out one evening to Sarong restaurant, and on another one watched a movie in their in villa cinema, which are both not to be missed experiences! 

The Staff was always friendly, discreet, professional and always willing to assist you with a smile.

The space is ginormous, so you can have a lot of people and kids have a lot of space to play. There is also a wading pool for them next to the lap pool. 

All service are included and always available (food, drinks, car, and first class massage at super good price). Alltogether for a big party it is not only incredibly luxurious and fun but surprisingly good value for money.

Definitely will come back and have no hesitation in recommending villa Mary to anyone."
title: "Villa Mary" Pantai Lima, Canggu

photos.caption: View of the Mountain Bike Tour

text:
I had an excellent stay in February this year at Villa Mary. 
I cannot imagine a better place to stay when you go to Bali: it is so beautiful & peaceful you wish to stay forever. 
This independent villa have a very large garden and some amazing vues on the sea, the beach & the rice fields. 
The staff is professional & friendly. All of them are trying their best to make your stay as pleasant as possible. They are always happy to help and improve the quality of your stay. 
The food is so fresh, locally sourced, the cooks have some very good skill to create the best of European & Asian food you can choose from! 
We shared the villa with 3 others families and everyone had his private space for a very enjoyable holiday. 
I rested a lot and I am considering coming back with my three children and some friends next year.
title: Villa Mary

text:
My wife and I and ten of our friends have just had the most fantastic four days at this villa
We booked for my wife's 60th birthday and from the moment we walked through the door we were 
treated like royalty it was if this was our own home
Made and Agus and all the staff of the villa were on hand to cater for our every need
The rooms were of the highest standard all decorated in different themes and always clean and tidy.
The chef and his staff cooked the best food always something different on many occasions we had
between 20/23 people for lunch or dinner and to the credit of all the staff we were all feed with the
minimum of fuss
On the night of the party we were treated to a seafood buffet on the lawn and Made and her staff 
organised the most fabulous night with fireworks on the beach .
I and all our friends will always remember this stay at villa sound of sea and if you want a relaxing 
stay in luxury book this venue.
A big thank you to all the great staff

John and Dianne 
Sydney Australia (22/9/2012)
title: Amazing Bali luxury

text:
I've never stayed in a private luxurious resort like this before and it exceeded my expectations. Just our two families and kids and we lived like kings for a week. The resort was spotless and you won't find a location better than this sitting on the beach!

The staff were amazing and friendly, even playing with our little kids which was very nice. They prepared special separate meals for our baby and 5 year as well. 

Mardi, Agus and all the staff did everything we could possibly ask for and nothing was any trouble.  

I can't wait to get back again someday and eat my way through the day, wake up to a surf, massage and pool!

Thank you.
title: wow!!!!

text:
The best place for a private getaway on Bali for me and my friends.

Completely different experience to the other resorts.
title: The real deal ...

text:
It was 20 years since we'd last been to Bali, sad as up until then we'd been regular visitors since our firss trip in the mid 70's. So it was with some trepedation that we stepped off the plane. Would the magic have disappeared? Sure Bali has changed but 4 days at the Villa Mary eased us into the new Bali ... and what a way to be inducted. To make it even more exciting we were meeting friends at the Villa Mary to celebrate a milestone birthday.

The Villa which has 5 bedrooms sits in a gloriously maicured garden with views across the rice paddies to the mountains on one side and the ocean on the other. Not that the ocean was an option for us - why bother when you can watch the waves from the comfort of a 25 metre infinity pool? The panoramas from the bedrooms, living and dining pavillions were eqally as spectacular.

Each bedroom was individually styled, all with amazing bathrooms which featued outdoor baths. Ours was sat amid a lotus pool and reached via a bridge. The beds are sheathed in mosquito nets which are untied ever night.

The service was discreet but outstanding. All meals were prepared by the Villa's staff from a suggested menu. The table was set in a variety of locations depending on the time of day, weather and mood. The cinema room with it's lounges was tempting but relaxing with a book won out. We didn't even contemplate the gym or tennis courts! 

A driver was available 10 hours a day for airport transfers and excursions. 

I'm already planning how soon we can return.
title: A Perfect Re-introduction to Bali

text:
We recently stayed in Sound of the Sea Villa  for our Wedding and honeymoon with our friends and family and we all had an amazingly special stay here. 
The rooms are really spacious and they had thought of every detail in every room.
But overall it was the staff that made this beautiful place into an amazing memory.
Highly recommend this Villa, its very peaceful and quiet place with own private beachfront and as this is only 5 villas complex with private entrance so it feels like you have the place to yourself.
We would definitely go back again. 
.
title: “Excellent service and beautiful location  Sound of the Sea“

text:
The villa is great, staff is very service oriented. We were 4 couples and enjoyed the villa a lot. 

Be careful to order something in advance if you do not have a driver ready for you as its location is far from the markets.
title: Great place, great staff

text:
When friends announced their wedding would be held at Pantai Lima, I immediately checked out the villas online. The photos oozed luxury and relaxation. What the photos couldn't convey was exactly how outstanding Pantai Lima truly is. The photos couldn't convey the friendly, yet simultaneously unobtrusive staff. The photos couldn't convey the pure stress-release induced by the yoga instructor and massage therapists. Pantai Lima is all of this and so much more.

Wedding guests were placed in every villa except Villa Waringin (not enough guests to fill all of them). Each villa possessed its own benefits ranging from private outdoor showers to hidden courtyard gardens and from infinity pools to a movie theater. I stayed in Villa Mary and cannot find one thing to complain about, however, guests in all the villas echoed the same sentiment.

Every need, and even those we didn't know we had, were met. One afternoon, I went into the dining room to see our villa manager to organize the driver for later in the day. One of the staff said that I looked as if I could use a drink and would I care for one, how about a fresh banana smoothie? I hadn't been thirsty, but at the suggestion of this, I couldn't refuse. The staff insisted I return to my lounging spot by the pool and that the smoothie would be delivered to me momentarily. And sure enough, a few minutes later, I basked in the sun, delicious smoothie in hand.
title: Impeccable service and amenities

text:
We spent a few days at the Villa in June with friends and it was the best experience we have ever had, staying in a villa in Bali...

The Villa is one of the best villas available in Bali, with a great location, right on the Beach, facing the Ocean.
(lots of villas in Bali are close to each other inland, nothing exceptional).
The name gives it all, the only sound you hear is that of the Ocean.

The villa is reached from the main road though a small winding lane across rice fields and cows, and part of a compound of 5 villas only, all luxurious ones.
It is close enough to the aiport (1hour), close to Semyniak for shopping and Ku De Ta at night, and nearby TanahLot temple.

It has one of the best facings in the compound.
True balinese style, peaceful, different wings  for the bedrooms, so great for several families who want to holiday together and still have some privacy.

I had the best big room at the top, with a spacious balcony overlooking the Ocean, an open bathtub and a comfortable recliner to read outdoor. Bliss.
Nice design in the room, and nice big bathroom.

The decoration in the villa is balinese yet modern, a nice combination.
Food was excellent, you choose from a menu beforehand and the Chef cooks it for you. 
He was a real Chef, not a cook, and we got gourmet dishes, like in an exclusive restaurant, at a fraction of the cost, and quite cheap, since you only pay for the ingredients. 
If you come with kids, I would suggest bringing a few snacks though, as everything has to be planned in advance, and there is no extra "stock" there.

The staff was extremely friendly and helpful, and discreet at the same time, so you feel like you are in your own house too.Nothing was a pb, there was always a solution: refreshing...

The best:  a walk on the beach in front of the villa after breakfast, either towards the surfer's beach to the left, or to the little fishermen's village on the right. Bliss.

We will definitely come back with our families, as you get the best of both worlds in the luxury world:
your own house with service at hotel level.
title: True relaxed luxury- must try

text: 這是一個美麗的私人海景別墅，這裡有4間客房，按摩池， 大泳池， 草地。我們只逗留數天，巳不想離開。因為我們到達時間巳是晚上八點多，所以之前，已聯絡為我們準備晚餐，這頓晚餐是讚不絕口，廚師煮得很好，食物價格也很合理，不會令你失望。很棒的員工，還有管家，為我們打點一切，如有機會，會再選擇這裡度假，絕對推薦這個別墅酒店。
title: 不會忘記的美好回憶 - Villa Mary

text: dalış ve sörf için gittiğim Bali'de huzuru buldum. genel olarak güzel bir yer. Çevre turları, dalış, sörf derken otelde çok vakit geçiremesek de otele geldiğimizde o sakinlik gerçekten her şeye değer.
title: huzur

text:
Nous rentrons d'un séjour de 8 nuits entre amis à la villa Mélissa et que le retour est difficile ! La maison est splendide et la déco très réussie. 3 des 5 chambres ont vue mer. La première piscine fait 20 mètres et on peut y faire des longueurs. La seconde est plus décorative. La plage est belle mais réservée aux surfeurs. Le personnel est aux petits soins. Vous leur faites part de vos souhaits et ils vous organisent vos journées. Tout est possible : rafting, plongée, visites culturelles, plage... Sur demande, ils font venir manucures et masseuses pour un prix tellement bas qu'il serait dommage de ne pas en profiter! Comptez environ 10 € pour un massage et 15 € pour une manucure pédicure. Les massages sont de grande qualité. On peut réellement avoir confiance. Dernier point et pas des moindre, la cuisine! Une carte vous est proposée mais vous pouvez tout à fait suggérer autre chose. Tout est délicieux ! Au bout de quelques jours, vous n'avez plus très envie d'aller au restaurant... Je recommande tous les barbecues (viande, fruits demer) mais aussi le poisson cuit en feuille de bananier ou la tatin de mangue. 
Nous avons vécu une expérience inoubliable. L'endroit est sublime et le personnel au top. Si vous partez en famille ou entre amis, la location d'une villa comme celle- ci est bien préférable à l'hôtel !
Bref, hautement recommandé !
title: Le rêve

text: Suite à notre séjour à Balam Bali Villa.Nous avons opté pour un séjour en bord de mer. Notre chois de Villa Sound of the sea nous a véritablement enchanté, Endroit calme et paradisiaque, Chambres tout confort dispatchées autour d'une piscine magnifique. Le petit plus consiste en un staff très professionnel, une cuisine rafinée, agrémentée d'un agréable service. Encore merci à eux. Petite précision: Une voiture avec chauffeur est constamment à votre disposition. Fred et Daniel.
title: SEJOUR INOUBLIABLE

text:
Après avoir visité Bali nous avons passé une semaine de rêve dans la villa fin août 2008 avec des amis. 

C’est un endroit magnifique, calme et paisible, donnant directement sur la mer et qui allie espace, raffinement, confort et convivialité. 
Le service est exceptionnel, avec une mention spéciale pour le  « butler » qui peut aussi bien vous conseiller sur les visites et trajets, que confirmer vos billets d’avion, réserver massages et restaurants, ou préparer votre cocktail favori. 
De plus la villa se trouve à peine à quelques dizaines de minutes en voiture des meilleurs shoppings et restaurants et des plus beaux temples de Bali. 
C’est un endroit que je ne peux que recommander et où je rêve de retourner.
title: Semaine de rêve dans la villa Sound of the Sea

photos.caption: ma chambre était en bas à droite, avec vue directe sur la mer et la piscine
